common.title: An error occurred
common.defaultMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

404.title: Page not found
404.message: The page you want to go is not currently available

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: You do not have permission to access this page.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: The server is experiencing issues. Please try again in a few minutes.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
